title: ICE: broken mir: Cannot compare unequal types fn(&str) and for<'r> fn(&'r str)  with -Zvalidate-mir

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code code from glacier / fixed/91636.rs ```Rust fn foo(_a: &str) {} fn main() { let x = foo as fn(&'static str); let _ = x == foo; } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.62.0-nightly (2a83fbc42 2022-04-12) binary: rustc commit-hash: 2a83fbc42a9bb6bfdb8d3fb4ecce83fb410d7642 commit-date: 2022-04-12 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.62.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.0 ``` `rustc ./91636.rs -Zvalidate-mir`
Backtrace
